snippet: President Barack Obama said on Monday he would take executive action to revamp the U.S. immigration system and move additional resources to protect the border after hopes of passing broad reform legislation in Congress officially died....

headline.print_headline: Obama Says to Reform Immigration on His Own, Bypassing Congress
headline.main: Obama Says to Reform Immigration on His Own, Bypassing Congress

lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said on Monday he would take executive action to revamp the U.S. immigration system and move additional resources to protect the border after hopes of passing broad reform legislation in Congress officially died.
